task.title: How to exchange fiat for crypto
task.shortdesc: In this guide you will learn how to exchange fiat money for Cryptocurrency.

step.cmd: Select Buy Crypto then click P2P Trading on the top navigation.
Click Buy and select the currency you want to buy. Filter the price and the Payment in the drop-down, select an ad, then click Buy.
Enter the amount (in your fiat currency) or quantity (in crypto) you want to buy and click Buy

taskbody.result: After the completion of the transactions, you will own the Cryptocurrency you bought in your wallet.
